website_summaries.verdict: This chime kit features several dozen chimes to choose from, as well as a variety of mounting options for the transmitter.
pros: Set comes with a transmitter and 2 receivers, as well as screws and double-sided tape
Temperature range of -4 to 140 degrees Fahrenheit
Features 52 chimes, 40-millimeter stereo speakers, and 5 volume levels
cons: Some buyers claim that this item arrived broken, or stopped working fairly quickly

customer_reviews.title: Great doorbell!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many wireless doorbell over the past few years, and I can say positively that this one is the best I have ever used!! The ease of setup is foolproof, anyone can use this unit. The range is very good, and it is quite loud. With 52 different tunes to choose from, I think most everyone can find one they like, or change it at will. I recommend this doorbell highly!
customer_reviews.author: crazyhorse357

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a long range doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doorbell for an indoor installation. My home is very securely constructed of concrete and steel. I have had problems getting a doorbell with sufficient range, which is why I bought this one. The 1500 foot range is a fantasy. I attempted to use it over about a 75 foot range, and it would not reach. I finally installed it in a less suitable position which is about 40 feet from the doorbell button. It does work at that point, but if you’re looking for a long-range doorbell, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this because I can plug it into any outlet ...
customer_reviews.text: " I cannot say enough about this wireless doorbell. I love this because I can plug it into any outlet in the house and hear the doorbell ring. With the previous wireless doorbell if I was in my bedroom I wouldn’t be able to hear when someone rang the doorbell. But not with Avantek, I don’t miss anyone now at my door. Not to mention you can even set 52 different chimes, just in time for Christmas, so I have a melody that is Christmassy programmed. The only downfall is trying to pick just 1 chime to use, the selections are unbelievable. The Avantek doorbell is one of the best gadgets I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Monice

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the rear entrance at my daughter's school for the after school program. They bought like 3 that would just not connect at the range they were from the gate. Bought this and the teachers are so happy. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: FUBAR

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other wireless doorbells and after a short time they cease to work. This doorbell is lasting way longer. It has a great tone so I can hear it easily. Is staying secure on the outside of the house even in the cold. I will purchase another for my back door.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless door bell.  Sturdy, works, and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: If you want a wireless door bell that has a nice simple "door bell" ring then this is the product for you. It works perfectly and doesn't sound obnoxious. There's a volume control and options for different chimes, but I like the simple ding dong door bell sound. Had it for a couple of months and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Procter

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: A good little WIFI doorbell. 52 choices of "chime" is great but the songs are just too long. Would have liked to have music for my chime but had to choose one of the animal sounds to get a shorter chime. Would be nice if Vendor could give you a listing in order of sounds included so you wouldn't have to listen to all 52 to find the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great choices for sounds.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a hot climate and stuck it on, instead of using screws, to preserve my stucco. When it got real hot, it fell off. The sounds are awesome! I like animals, so love the many choices. Very easy to change to a different selection.
customer_reviews.author: Dahmer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: I love the doorbell, however it wasn’t used much and lasted exactly a year. After buying a new battery determined the plug in receiver was bad. Might order another receiver because I don’t want to take the doorbell off the outside of the house.
customer_reviews.author: June3

customer_reviews.title: Lots Of Cool Tunes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because my current one wasn't very loud. I like the loud volume and multiple sounds this one makes. The fact that it plugs in to the wall helps save on batteries also.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works just as described
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works just as described. This unit has lots of different bell options (although some of them we didn't like). This unit was one of only a few that we saw that the receiver was dual voltage 120/220v which we happened to need for our house overseas.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce P Petro

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: An easy and stylish way to replace our old, ugly doorbell. Because of the price, even if it only lasts 1 year, I will still be happy.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Our wired doorbell no longer worked so we needed a wireless doorbell. This fit the bill perfectly. It was very easy to install and select the different door bells. The black door bell looks good on our log home.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, looks good, and no installation necessary, it was just plug n play
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Does't work
customer_reviews.text: It rings when nobody is at the door!! This product DOES NOT WORK. It rings all the time but nobody is at the door. It is a waste of money don't buy it!!!! Maybe mine is defected? Would appreciate some feedback from the seller regarding this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Easy setup. Can hear it anywhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: JIM C

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It arrived today. Very easy to install. So far the only complaint I have is the volume is not very loud. It would be perfect if it came with two units that could be plugged in different rooms where it could be heard better. Or at least have the option to purchase a second unit for volume.
customer_reviews.author: normat

customer_reviews.title: I like the looks and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks and easy to install. It's loud but I wish it's louder. If you only have one downstairs you might not hear it upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Thawatchai

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, now let's see if the battery last for as long as they say it will.
customer_reviews.author: plo

customer_reviews.title: So many boor bell rings
customer_reviews.text: Great loud sound, or can be adjusted to be softer sounding. A lot of sounds of music, animals, and regular door bell sounds. I have Mozart on mine.
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and how loud it is. the price is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Basic and childish...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good basic doorbell. The chimes sound extremely childish. Other than that, it's OK.
customer_reviews.author: 5koliny

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After a few days, the outside button stopped working, it lites up but so sound The product is defective and the vendor looks like he is not going to back the product, asking to many questions ,why bother NOT RECOMENDED
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Classroom Gem!
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my classroom, but wish it had more variety of sounds.
customer_reviews.author: tracy scott

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should.. an electrical interuption will ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should..an electrical interuption will make it ring upon reestablishing electrical flow.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Mashburn

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about a day. Not anymore. Got a refund. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Lam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my kids love playing with the different sounds. range is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Merino Jr

customer_reviews.title: Its very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: How i live this wireless door bell. Its very easy to assemble, n setup. Many choice of tones, n volume level. Its def a plug and use product.
customer_reviews.author: You

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So many nice tones to choose from. We pick a new tone each month. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good - works like a charm - have bought several.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: I love the easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy set up. Just make sure you take the sticker off of the batteries in the small part.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Works great east installation.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my two buildings. Easy to install. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Remote Door Bell
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems superior to others I've tried. And if you tire of the sound it's simple enough to change it to one of many optional sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jones

customer_reviews.title: NOT LOUD AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product unless you plan to have it plugged in RIGHT NEXT TO YOU. Volume is very low. I have a small house and I can not hear it ring unless it is plugged in right next to my head. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and no fuss, but with lots of tones
customer_reviews.text: Installation was dead easy, pairing was simple, and the product so far works great. The build quality is slightly higher than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scribble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s super convenient... Easy to install, and easy to use. And it looks good too... I like it.
customer_reviews.author: imnotprince

customer_reviews.title: I dont like that it doesnt light up at
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has so many different chimes. I don't like that it doesnt light up at night. It only lights up when someone push the button to ring the doorbell. I thought it had LED automatic night light up when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is super easy to get going and is perfect for what ...
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to get going and is perfect for what I needed. Now I can hear when I have packages left at my door.
customer_reviews.author: I have a huge rooster

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do well in the cold!
customer_reviews.text: When it works it's great. Lately it only works 40% of the time leaving visitors standing unnoticed in the freezing cold for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work after 5 minute!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I are very disappointed with this product!! The volume on the doorbell stopped working after 5 minutes. We would like a refund &/or a new doorbell. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: La Fille Lucky

customer_reviews.title: It is a great door bell
customer_reviews.text: It is a great door bell, easy to be installed and works super good. It comes with in a transmitter and a receiver also including 2 screws. But since the transmitter itself has adhesive tape on the back, so I just stick the transmitter directly on my outdoor wall. It is very tight. I plug in the receiver inside home. The receiver has lot of melodies to choose from. We can hear the bell rings anywhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tons of tone selection's. Easy set up less then 10 seconds
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: !A very nice doorbell at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice doorbell! It was very easy to install, and has a pleasant chime.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Frenkel

customer_reviews.title: Really bad stuff
customer_reviews.text: It’s say 400 meters of range but it not even works at 30 meters!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Villa

customer_reviews.title: Works and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for me. Easy to install and not expensive. Overall positive purchase.
customer_reviews.author: angela armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I got it after I got my new house, very easy to install and to use, great looking also, my family and my friends all love it!
customer_reviews.author: BSKA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't half ring. Most times it does nothing. And the box may only be 10 ft away max
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the wireless doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Love the wireless doorbell. Only thing is my child knows how to change the sound and keeps changing it to an animal sound and I don’t hear it ring lol
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Opoku

customer_reviews.title: but only liked 3 of them
customer_reviews.text: lot's of different sounds, but only liked 3 of them
customer_reviews.author: tim snyder

customer_reviews.title: Me likey
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Different ring tones and works far away from button
customer_reviews.author: keith halverson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very cool door bell easy to install and a lot of different ring tones
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gnyp

customer_reviews.title: Work's great
customer_reviews.text: I love this doorbell, I don't have to rewire or anything complicated, just plug into an outlet and place outside the door.
customer_reviews.author: coney

customer_reviews.title: Plug in and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It works as I expect. 50 ringtone. Plug in and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive problem solution.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to "install." I have a glass panel by my front door, and that's where I stuck the doorbell since the stucco wall around the door is too bumpy and uneven for the tape to stick evenly. The default bell sounds loud and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Shaxpur

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! My husband loved the doorbell for our new home. It has a Harry Potter chime also just a FYI
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: He called me and loved it. Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to a friend. He called me and loved it. Great quality and price....
customer_reviews.author: Minute Reader

customer_reviews.title: Never failed, battery still going
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My place doesn’t have a door bell and people were having to call my phone to get us to answer the door. This fixed that and it’s loud enough that two fingers can be heard throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: Motoken

product_meta.title: AVANTEK DB-11 Wireless Doorbell, Waterproof Door Chime Kit Operating at Over 1300 Feet with 52 Melodies, CD Quality Sound and LED Flash
feature_bullets: HIGH PERFORMANCE TRANSMITTER: Ultra-low power consumption; uses CR2032 lithium battery that boasts 3-year maximum lifespan; IP55 dustproof and waterproof rating; works between -4 °F to 140 °F; withstands various harsh weather conditions

300 M/1,000FT ULTRA LONG WIRELESS RANGE: 1 plug-in receiver included; will not interfere with other equipment in your home or those of your neighbors; ensures you will never miss a visitor, even if you are a few rooms away or on another floor

52 CHIMES TO CHOOSE FROM: 40 mm stereo speaker delivers rich and crisp sound; 5 adjustable volume levels with a maximum setting of 115 dB; press Next or Previous button to easily choose from 52 melodies
MEMORY FUNCTION: Remembers your last melody and volume level after a power outage; no need to reset to your previous settings; convenient and easy-to-use design for an enhanced user experience
EASY TO SET UP: Can add more AVANTEK DB-1 receivers for increased coverage; includes 2 screws, 2 anchors, 1 key, 1 adhesive tape for easy installation of the transmitter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars180 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
